allow: Bash(RAILS_ENV=test bundle exec rails db:drop db:create db:migrate)
Bash(RAILS_ENV=development bundle exec rails runner "puts ''Redis normal connection: '' + REDIS_CLIENT.ping")
Bash(RAILS_ENV=development bundle exec rails runner "puts ''Rack::Attack Redis URL: '' + Rails.application.credentials.dig(:REDIS, :REDIS_RACK_ATTACK_URL).to_s[0..50] + ''...''")
